alert.note: Alert for Childress; Cottle; Hall; Motley (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lubbock (Lubbock and South Plains Texas)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 22 at 4:43PM CDT until May 22 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Lubbock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lubbock Texas has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Childress County in the Panhandle of Texas... Northeastern Motley County in northwestern Texas... Northwestern Cottle County in northwestern Texas... Eastern Hall County in the Panhandle of Texas... * Until 545 PM CDT. * At 443 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles northwest of Northfield, or 10 miles east of Turkey, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Northfield, Tell, Estelline and Plaska Community. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
